website_summaries.verdict: A great choice for large families or for those who want an extra level of organization to their sorting.
pros: The bags are individually washable and work great for larger families
Buyers like the sleek design of the frame and fabric
Lightweight frame and sturdy wheels makes it easy to move about your house
cons: A few customers wished the bags were larger
The seams have a tendency to become loose

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup and sturdy. Makes the hamper situation in our room so much neater and I love being able to take one bag out at a time as needed.
customer_reviews.author: J. Green

customer_reviews.title: My wife and i absolutely love this. Its really convenient
customer_reviews.text: My wife and i absolutely love this. Its really convenient! We are a family of 3 and having to sort out clothes is a real pain in the.. lol with this we save alot of time and space. Each cubby holds a normal sized load. It was also fairly simple to assemble. Took me about 7 minutes. I would definitely recommend this for a family of 3+. Thanks for reading.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge A

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed :)
customer_reviews.text: I have been complaining about laundry baskets to my husband for years. I finally just decided to fix my own problem. I love that with these bags I can have the laundry seperated without just dumping it all on the floor. As you can see, we have limited space. This fits perfectly in our lil laundry room. It came with wheels but since I don't have the option of moving it I didn't attach the wheels. But I did put it together all by myself in about 10 minutes with two sleeping babies in the next room. So that was awesome. The bags are removable if I needed to for some reason.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra koelle

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest quality, but works.
customer_reviews.text: I don't love this hamper, but it works for sorting clothes. A couple parts came damaged but that didn't effect assembly. The frame is very wobbly and the metal bars feel very cheap. I don't expect it to hold up forever, but the bags hold lots of clothes and so far are holding up well after 4-5 months of use. Assembly took only a few minutes and was not complicated.
customer_reviews.author: Six

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for narrow space
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for: a multi compartment sorter that fits nicely in our narrow space. Very easy to build as well.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Dop

customer_reviews.title: I actually quite love it, but I just wish the materials were ...
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to give this product 5 stars, I actually quite love it, but I just wish the materials were a bit better quality for the price. The bars are not very thick and I worry they may bend, but so far they've been fine. The bags are just OK. One ripped immediately, but the seller promptly sent me extra replacements and I haven't had a problem with the new ones. Overall it's a great product, I guess for the price I just expect better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Strauther

customer_reviews.title: JUST WOW DISAPPOINTING
customer_reviews.text: I just got this and 3 out of 4 bags are already falling apart. I HAVENT EVEN ASSEMBLED IT AND I NOTICES THE BAGS ARE COMING APART. I am so disappointed because all the reviews don’t say anything about this.....
customer_reviews.author: David Berryhill

customer_reviews.title: Smelly out of the box, be patient. Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Beware of the Smell. These bags have an odor that takes a lot of Febreeze airing out and time to go away (2-3 weeks). That being said..one bag arrived poorly stitched leaving a hole in the bottom. Company promptly replaced it. Unit is sturdy and bags a good size. This would be a 5 star if not for smell
customer_reviews.author: RocSportsNut

customer_reviews.title: SAVING YOU TIME AND MONEY SO READ THIS PLEASE
customer_reviews.text: It's cheap aluminum that literally bends if you have too much clothes or want to look through a bag. Bent and snapped one of the front beams within a few days. I cannot understand why this product has good reviews. Goodluck if you buy it please review when it breaks thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Great Laundry Tool
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my wife, because she wanted an easier way to take the laundry from the upstairs to the basement. She has laundry baskets, but they always got heavy and awkward to carry. The hanging bags are just the right size to easily take out of the rack and carry to the laundry room. The quality of the materials seems to be pretty good too especially for the price I paid for it ($39.99).
customer_reviews.author: shinerblack

customer_reviews.title: Compact and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I like how it fills up for 1 wash load....and I have an extra large capacity washer. The designs is compact too for small spaces but after 1 week, one of the stitchings on the handle ripped off. I will sew it but it shouldn’t have ripped so easily, hence the 4 stars
customer_reviews.author: ERRN Mom

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but bags are very short and don’t hold much.
customer_reviews.text: The bags and frame are very sturdy which was nice. The bags smelled when we opened them and are still airing our over a week later. My main issue was with how small the bags are. They are a good 4-5 inches shorter than our last sorter. We can’t even get a full 4 days of clothes sorted in a bag. For example, my husband wears carhart canvas work pants for work and after a full week of work that bin is completely full with no room for anything else like jeans. Also, once the bin is full the handles are pretty small and short and make it difficult to grab. Overall, not impressed and returning.
customer_reviews.author: Manders511

customer_reviews.title: Changed the effort of doing laundry!
customer_reviews.text: I am so sad I didn’t buy this year’s ago! The bags hold a reasonably sized load of laundry for our front loader, and since it’s all pre-sorted I just grab the bag by the convenient handles and carry it to the washer. The angled tops make it easy for my partner to still toss laundry in from across the room and with everything pre-sorted he can start a load when I’m not even home
customer_reviews.author: Julie G

customer_reviews.title: Not as robust as I had hoped
customer_reviews.text: It works as advertised but it is not as sturdy as I had hoped. I tried rolling it from my apartment to the laundry room and back; after doing so, the framing was slanted from pulling it along. I had to tighten the screws up in order to square it back up. This might work better for you if you don't plan on moving it much.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The lock buttons are a pain!
customer_reviews.text: It looks great, seems sturdy enough but putting it together was a pain in the ***! The assembly seemed easy enough but the metal lock buttons that keep the frame together kept sticking and God forbid you accidentally put it together wrong the first time then have to try to pop the buttons back out and start over. I almost gave up and thought about returning it. By the time I got it assembled, my fingers hurt. Thankfully, I conquered and it looks and works great. In addition to the wrench, they should also include a bottle of wine.
customer_reviews.author: Raster Disaster

customer_reviews.title: Stinky
customer_reviews.text: Has a very strong odor to the bags. I don’t even want to put dirty laundry in it.
customer_reviews.author: Jared E. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Love This: Sturdy, Well-sized, durable
customer_reviews.text: Quality: Not like it would be in a commercial laundromat but QUITE STURDY nonetheless and we are Delighted with it!!! The wheels work well. The frame is strong. Each of the 4 bags/bins is waterproof. Each bag/bin can be easily lifted from frame if need be. Size: Perfect size, it is large enough, and we are especially pleased because this is not gigantic. It is hard to find a laundry sorter that has more than 3 bins. We like 4 bins (just a personal preference related to the way we sort our colors) and this works so well. The bags fit a load of laundry each.
customer_reviews.author: Elsact

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: This is not heavy duty. My wife, son, daughter and myself have a bin and at half loaded, the first time I rolled it, the screws popped a ways out. I applied lock tight to them and let it cure for 24 hours. Then tried again. Now the metal is warped. The canvas is pretty sturdy, but the frame is junk.
customer_reviews.author: E. Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Great hamper
customer_reviews.text: Love this hamper. Bags have held up well and are only just starting to show a little wear. They hold a lot of laundry each. I tend to just take out the bags and leave the hamper in the closet but I've never had any issues wheeling it along. It's sturdy, functional, and looks nice. I let mine air out for a few days after I got it and there was no lingering chemical smell after that. Worth every penny, makes laundry much easier. Just got a 2nd one for my boys and will buy again if this one wears out.
customer_reviews.author: White Owl

customer_reviews.title: If you like to wear your entire wardrobe before washing it, this is for you
customer_reviews.text: I tend to go a very long time in-between washing my clothes because like most Americans I have to many. This little baby will hold 4-6 weeks of laundry waiting to be washed. I have packed countless articles of clothing into this sorter and it was withstood everything I have thrown at it. I highly recommend this if you have a metric ton of clothes that pile up. It can withstand almost anything.
customer_reviews.author: C.K.Bigby

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy enough for my 3 year old to ride it around like a car before we put the bags in. Wheels large enough to roll it around on thick carpet fully loaded. Bags a good size. We actually use it to sort clean clothes by family member since we often get to the washing but not the folding and putting away part. Works way better than I thought! Now the kids just bring the bag into their room and stuff the contents in their drawers. No need for me to fold just so they can jam it in the drawer in a ball anyway 😆
customer_reviews.author: carlson

customer_reviews.title: Wish I Bought This Sooner
customer_reviews.text: This was just what I needed! Initially bought this to keep in my laundry room that is located in the basement and loved having my laundry already sorted in advance. My teenage boy was learning to do his own laundry and always had questions about what items could be washed together. Bought a second one for his room. He found this much more useful than tossing his dirty clothes in a single clothes hamper and then having to sort everything on laundry day. It is very sturdy and extremely simple to assemble. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Walking Buddy

customer_reviews.title: Quality sorter, just a little too big
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, but not as sturdy as the 3 hamper model I got for my adult children. The bags are a little less substantial and the length of the crossbars (to hold 4 bags) is a little less stable. It also a little harder to find a place for it with the longer length. It is NOT a flimsy sorter and it's probably unfair to compare it to the three bagger, but I will go to the three bagger if and when this one wears out.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Clark

customer_reviews.title: Felt like it didn’t fit together
customer_reviews.text: The idea of this is great but the actual product doesn’t fit together. I even tried hammering it so it pieced together but it just looks like the pipes don’t fit into each other well. I already built it and didn’t feel like taking it apart just to return it so it’ll do for now. I suggest picking another hamper.
customer_reviews.author: Camille

customer_reviews.title: I'm liking it
customer_reviews.text: It's the perfect size for a load of laundry. It's easy to put together. I got a different one before this and the bag started falling apart because it was just too thin. These bags are nice and thick. The bars are strong and sturdy. The wheels are great. I'm planning on getting one for the kids. Update: We've had this for some time now. My husband washed one of the bags (don't ask me why he just did) the lining of the bag came apart. Other than that I love this. I love my husband but there are days I'm tellin' ya.
customer_reviews.author: Just a mom

customer_reviews.title: Pre-sort your laundry
customer_reviews.text: Per order of the chief laundress*, I ordered and assembled this to replace the wicket basket we'd used for years. It allows us to pre-sort the laundry and delicates into its four bins, and each bin more-or-less corresponds to a load of wash, which makes figuring out when to do laundry a snap. We like it! *Yes, I do laundry, too, but only under strict supervision lest I deviate from the approved procedures set down by the chief laundress.
customer_reviews.author: Circuit Hacker

customer_reviews.title: What you'd expect
customer_reviews.text: This hamper is exactly what you'd expect it to be. Sturdy, on wheels if you need to move and color is as described. Only gave 4 stars because I think price is a little high after I did a little looking. My fault for not checking as well, but Walmart & Target have cheaper equals that actually matched the room I was furnishing better than this one. Ended up buying another elsewhere and giving this one to someone else to use. Other than that, product is good.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: After receiving my laundry sorter without wheels or instructions in the box, I called customer service to request wheels and instructions. They offered to send an entirely new item and recommended keeping the original one for parts! Excellent. Turned a rather frustrating situation into a great one that makes me more than comfortable ordering from this company again knowing they stand behind their product :-) P.S. - The quality of the bags and parts I did have was very good! No doubt it's gonna work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Joi S.

customer_reviews.title: Wrong pieces included, couldn't even put it together
customer_reviews.text: Husband and I puzzled over this for a few minutes before realizing that the "handle" pieces included were exactly the same rather than mirrored, so the screws couldn't be properly screwed in on both sides. So disappointing to pay so much for a "fancy" laundry basket and find out the bad reviews had it right. This product is not good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth Delp

customer_reviews.title: Life changing laundry sorter for a busy household!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know how I made it through 6 years of motherhood without this sorter. I labeled bar with masking tape next to each of the 4 laundry bags. When I’m ready, I lift 1 bag and dump it in the wash. My floor is now not taken over by piles of sorted laundry! Also when I was unpacking after a long trip, I wheeled the sorter to my luggage and just sorted directly in to the sorter from all 3 luggage pieces. Then wheeled it all to my washing machine. I couldn’t be happier with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: N. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made, sturdy, and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This laundry sorter is just what I hoped it would be. It's sturdy but lightweight and easy to move around - although I don't plan to roll the whole unit anywhere so have locked the 2 locking wheels to keep it in place in my closet. Assembly was easy, requiring no tools other than a screwdriver. I did it by myself, sitting in my armchair while watching a movie. My laundry is now conveniently presorted in generous bags with carrying handles. I'm a single senior and don't have mountains of laundry, so this was a very good purchase for me.
customer_reviews.author: Rene Mayo

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer
customer_reviews.text: I've had this product for 2 months now. I love how easy it was to assemble and the quality of the laundry bags. I have 4 children and we went from having laundry hampers everywhere to this laundry sorter in one convenient location. Everyone has to put their clothes in THEIR bag and I make my older children do their own laundry with this system. Ahhh. Love it!! Laundry has become much easier to manage
customer_reviews.author: Landon Ketchersid

customer_reviews.title: Not terrible for the price
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it's not a bad laundry holder. When putting it together I noticed that 1 of the bars that are supposed to hook together for the bottom (3 bars across) was made incorrectly. Therefore, I can only put these 2 across on the bottom. There is a slight smell to them, but I feel that's to be expected of most things that are shipped to you. I dont want to initiate a return because I know I'll never send it back so I'm just going to keep it and hope for the best
customer_reviews.author: Dimitra Houliaras

customer_reviews.title: Metal is cheap and can't hold hardly any weight...
customer_reviews.text: The top metal frame broke, on it's own, two months into having this. I'm very disappointed as I ordered it specifically to fit into a unit I already have in my bathroom. Would very much like if I could exchange for a new one. I hope this isn't happening to others as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes laundry organized, but could be engineered a little better...
customer_reviews.text: Makes laundry organized, but could be engineered a little better. Some of the holes on the tubes weren't scalloped out to allow the screws to seat better. Some have the scallop and some do not, regardless of which side of the tube it is. It's not a biggie though, as the laundry cart is mostly hidden anyways. It does its job; holds laundry in four separate sections, and you can wheel it throughout your house as if you were in a hotel!
customer_reviews.author: Jarrett S.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty. Easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: The first package arrived damaged and a piece was missing. Amazon quickly sent a replacement. Easy to assemble. Wheels are heavy duty with metal bearings. There are a few areas of welding which are minimal. Wish the weld went all the way around instead of only two sides. I see this as a potential week spot. Time will tell. Love the horizontal bar in the middle at the base and side to reduce racking, which is what killed my last rack.
customer_reviews.author: Mama X

customer_reviews.title: Keeping all the dirty clothes separated in colors.
customer_reviews.text: I just received this item and we finally put it together. I use it only to put my Children’s clothes in it and I finally took it down to put my children’s clothes in the washer and the bag ripped without any effort what so ever. I LOVE the color I love the item! It’s everything I can ask for but how does the bag rip with ease? I’m kind of disappointed in this.😔 other then that the laundry basket is absolute amazing. Going to contact Amazon to see if they can send me a replacement piece.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Beauregard

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality! Not flimsy, sturdy metal, heavy canvas and well designed. Easy to assemble, but lay everything out first. The poles all look the same, but they are different sizes and it is very important that you put the right poles in the right places. I put one pole in wrong place, but it was easy to take off. I put it together by myself, (I’m a girl) and it took 15 minutes. Would have been a little easier for two people , one to hold it and one to put the screws in, but I assembled it on my bed without any problem.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Paton

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I really like this laundry cart. However when I first got it, it smelled awful - almost as if it was shipped in a connex full if fish. I had to put it outside for a couple of days because the smell was so bad that it permeated my whole garage. Now that the smell is gone, I truly enjoy this product. Sturdy, it holds more clothing than it appears it would hold, and the cart moves quite easily.
customer_reviews.author: thempteacher

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LOVE this thing!
customer_reviews.text: This bad boy makes laundry SO much easier! Before I could never get my bf to put his laundry in the closet basket, but this thing is making him SORT it!! We made one for towels, work tops, work bottoms, and casual clothes. Once a basket it full, we take it straight over to the washer and run a "normal" load. This has helped us stop over stuffing our cycles, which has made our clothes smell much better. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: leelee123

customer_reviews.title: It’s decent quality and easy to sssemble.
customer_reviews.text: It’s okay. It’s not amazing, and it’s not a piece of junk; a solid, average, 3 star item. It seems fairly sturdy, but the stitching on one of the bags came loose in a corner. I saw where somebody complained that it was over 30 inches instead of 17. The item description states the size accurately. The size of the PACKAGE it comes in is listed as 17”, not the assembled item. It helps to actually read the item description.
customer_reviews.author: Spurlin

customer_reviews.title: What are u waiting for!? GET IT
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. I purchased two! My husband is lazy and unorganized so I used a sharpie to label each bag (colors, whites, denims/work uniform, underwear/socks) and it’s working!!!! I love this system. The wheels are a plus NO MORE BREAKING YOUR BACK LOL
customer_reviews.author: Alexaida A.

customer_reviews.title: Not heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: The whole reason I bought this was for my childrens room. I bought it cause it stated it was heavy duty. It has very week tubing for the frame. It is already bending and the bags are not even full. There is also small holes on the stitching by all of the handles on all 4 bags. Very disappointed ☹️
customer_reviews.author: pumpkin

customer_reviews.title: Greatly simplifed doing our laundry!
customer_reviews.text: Took maybe 1/2 hour to assemble. Labeled frame where hags hang "Sheets and Towels" "Socks and underwear" "Lights" and "Darks" Now instead of bending over to sift through it all on the floor (usually missing something in the process) we just dump in a bag. We're in our 60s and don't really LIKE getting up and down that much. This trolley is a wonderful thing.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Fitzpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Good for smaller families.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this product. It seems quite sturdy compared to other laundry sorters I have used. Assembly was very easy; it needs a wrench, which is included, and a screwdriver, which isn't. It fits the space we have for it perfectly. The individual bags hold a full load of laundry, although our washer is not a high capacity unit. If you want to do massive loads of laundry you might be better off with a larger sorter than this. For my husband and I this suits perfectly and looks very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Mary T.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for laundry sorting in limited space!
customer_reviews.text: This unit has four roomy bags and convenient rollers! The whole family can sort their own clothes and we know which load needs to go next because you can see which bag needs to be emptied! No more piles of dirty laundry laying out. It's all stowed very nicely in our tiny laundry area. We just roll it in and out as needed to dump the next load in the washer! Best thing to happen to our laundry area since stacking washer/dryers!
customer_reviews.author: McMinnville, Oregon

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. These are sturdy and easy to put together. The fabric bags are just the right size for an average load. Customer service was top notch and very responsive to one simple issue I had with a small defect on an item. They took care of it promptly. Five star product and service. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: R. Burger

customer_reviews.title: Poor Finishes & Quality
customer_reviews.text: This product was rather easy to put together. The only required tool is a Phillips or flat head screwdriver. It rolls nicely and feels rather sturdy. However, after putting it together and looking at the final product, I am disappointed in the finishes. There are two small holes in every bag in the same place. This makes me fear that the holes will become larger. Additionally, the indentation on the poles to make the screws flat are inconsistent. Some of the poles have them, some only have them for one screw, and some do not have them at all. While the product still functions, I would not recommend this product to others because of how cheaply made it is.
customer_reviews.author: jwitty98

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Better design than the one I previously bought at Walmart. The bags are heavy-duty, though they initially have a strong smell. I suppose the smell is from the manufacturing process. I do like the concept of having metal handles that slip through the top of the bags (at the sides). Each bag will easily lift out so that you can take it to your laundry room, empty in the washer.
customer_reviews.author: S.B.

customer_reviews.title: Great solution to sorting on laundry day
customer_reviews.text: Got it this morning, assembly was uncomplicated and quick, though the divets for screw heads to recess in don’t make sense (on the inside and outside but not in anyway that’s logica; maybe mine got made wrong?), though that doesn’t mess with the sturdiness. I won’t be moving this around, so can’t speak to longevity for that use. I freehand drew labels on mine and I’m looking forward to a much simpler, more streamlined laundry day now!
customer_reviews.author: Mandolina

customer_reviews.title: Rolls easily, does the job
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I am getting too old to carry the big Plastic tub full of clean clothes from the laundry room to our bedroom. This cart rolls well and I just put the tub on top and roll it. I guess I could have just bought a small fold up dolly, but this one has canvas compartments and looks nice. Probably not good for an apartment or small house unless you have place to store it.
customer_reviews.author: texruss

customer_reviews.title: Clearly sent returned product: scratched up
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited for this but when it arrived it was clear it was a returned product being sold as a new product by the way it was scratched up all over. Not the type of quality I expected for a $40 product update: I have had this for 2 months now and one of the bags has busted. I had my old laundry sorter for 10 years so I know it is not user error and is a quality issue
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Graf

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the money. The bags seems pretty durable and strong. The assemble was easy and it seems very stable. No wiggling. Only downfall is I wish it were bigger. Meaning the bags held more. We have a lot of laundry in our house and all the bags are filled with extra on the floor. Overall, I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lindy Hall

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh. Whatever...
customer_reviews.text: It's seems like it will hold up.... But it's still cheaply made. Some of the bars were a little warped, some of the screws weren't threaded properly.... Still worked, just took more strength to get them in.... The bags are made out of a cheap material.... The colors are whatever..... All in all, good for the money.... Especially if this is going to be hidden in a laundry room... For me, the quality and colors are not good enough to display.
customer_reviews.author: elyselynee

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but should be cheaper
customer_reviews.text: Overall this was super easy to put together. Every part was clearly labeled and the instructions were easy! I’m terrible with putting stuff together so my bf wanted me to try for a good laugh. Jokes on him haha. Overall this is a good hamper. The bags are good, thick quality but of course aren’t super big. Overall it’s a nice hamper though... but I would set the price point as $25
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: It’s been only a month, but so far it’s worth it
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a laundry sorter that could be maneuvered through a small apartment yet hold all of our clothes. This does the job. We are able to sort by temperature, which makes life so much easier. And the sorter is easy to assemble; I have assembly rating of 4 just because some of the parts weren’t labeled. Otherwise, this is fantastic after a month’s use.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie T McMillan

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Way better than I expected actually. I am usually skeptical buying online but this was a worth buy. Very sturdy and a decent size, not too over bearing where you can't stash in the corner not in your way. It's nice to be able to sort and separate your clothes and have them ready to put in the wash especially if you have a partner who doesn't care and puts darks with whites. Well worth it
customer_reviews.author: Abigail monk

customer_reviews.title: ... to last a long time and looked strong and sturdy, however
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this to last a long time and looked strong and sturdy, however; when it is full and I pull on from one side it leans. Im already counting the days until this fails. I'm a little disappointed, i've tightened the bolts over and over because the tend to get loose over time.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Torres

customer_reviews.title: Bars bent, wobbly rack
customer_reviews.text: Everything arrived quickly and it wasn't until it was fully assembled that I realized that the bars on the base of the laundry rack were bent. You can attempt to twist them into a semi-normal rack, however, as it's on wheels and on my hardwood floors, it's easy to see that it doesn't line up properly. It's enough to get us by but it's not for long term solutions.
customer_reviews.author: Mary B

customer_reviews.title: Its functional, and pretty efficient for organization and perfect for small spaces.
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I bought this. I am pregnant and cannot carry big loads, this is easy to roll around the house and when I need to get my laundry downstairs it is easy to lift the compartments one at a time. It hold all of our clothes from one week, family of 3 going on 4. I use one compartment for each of us, until the baby comes the 4th one is just for socks. This is made so thoughtful, it fits in my closet and it takes a lot less space then the plastic huge bins I had before, it is also stetically pleasing 😉. You must Buy this!
customer_reviews.author: monica

customer_reviews.title: Ease, functional, & great looking!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the ease of putting this together & the functionality & beauty of this laundry sorter. I debated because I live in a small apartment. It is rather large but it is definitely worth it for the organization of laundry. The task takes me 2 days for each wash load so I look for everything I can do to shorten the project.
customer_reviews.author: Iris

customer_reviews.title: Holds a lot!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! At first I thought it was going to be too small but I am amazed at how much laundry you can get into each bag! We have 5 people in our family so we produce a lot of laundry. I am able to sort all the laundry into this with plenty of room. It is very sturdy and I expect it will hold up well over time. Other sorters that I have bought in the past did not hold up well at all but this one is a much better design than the others. It did have a bit of an odor at first but it has dissipated with time. Very pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: TheByrd’sNest

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy product that keeps your laundry organized and tidy up
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It was easy to assemble, and it’s sturdy. I know my wife loves me for it because she no longer has to carry a large laundry bag to the laundry room. Instead, she can now roll the laundry bags into the laundry room which makes things easier on her back. Separating the laundry is now a thing of the past. We now just drop the whites in one bag, the darks in another bag, the regulars in another bag and the delicates in another bag. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: MLZ

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and functional
customer_reviews.text: One of the bags had a hole. The manufacturer replaced it without any questions. Overall the frame is sturdy. The hangers are sturdy. The openings are not wide because there are 4 sacks on the unit. So don’t plan on just throwing close at it. However, each one does hold a lot clothes. We find it very functional. The hangers do fall off sometimes. Maybe because we have teenagers. :). Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had the cheap ones from Walmart. Never again! This sturdy laundry basket will last a lifetime and it’s nice. I roll it from room to room collecting the dirty clothes. It’s a lifesaver and time saver!! You can sort the clothes, roll it around room to room, and save a backache. I highly recommend this laundry basket. It looks good in my laundry room. Keeps it from looking messy. It’s now looks organized.
customer_reviews.author: Jase

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy With This Laundry Sorter
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleasantly surprised at the sturdiness of this laundry sorter. It was easy to assemble, I did it alone. The bags are of stiff material, so they stand up straight. I was afraid of them being slouchy and sloppy looking. When it's time to take the items to the washing machine, I can simply lift the bag of pre-sorted laundry using the handles or wheel the entire sorter. The laundry is always sorted and ready to be washed. I love this product and would recommend to anyone looking to simplify their laundry process!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Manual adjustments needed.
customer_reviews.text: One of my pieces were slightly bent. After putting together it was very slanted. I gently bent the piece straight and fixed the issue. One wheel is MUCH shorter than the others. To fix this I had to un screw it to make it level. Over all I like the product. In spite of "loosening" one wheel it feels pretty sturdy. For the price, I feel like the pieces should have fit together better. I shouldnt have to make adjustments in order to use my product.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke J

customer_reviews.title: Working well!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one to replace an older version. I'm not quite sold on it as you can't wash the bags and they seem to be smaller than my previous sorter so I feel like I'm doing laundry almost daily. It seems pretty sturdy, very easy to roll around and set up was a breeze esp without the instructions! Love the colors!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Good Hamper, no smell, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This hamper is sturdy and moves well over thick carpet and rugs, hardwood and tile. It was easy for me to assemble and I like the size of the wheels with locking mechanisms. The bags are easy to remove when you need to and hold a fair amount. We did not have an odor issue as some people have reported. There was no chemical smell at all and I have a sensitive nose! We like the modern design and the color is nice. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Wash your bags before using.
customer_reviews.text: I really do love this product, it was a great upgrade! I had a little issues with the assembly, but overall pretty easy. I recommend washing the bags before use, and adding a scent enhancer. It helped a lot with the chemical smell. I've had this product for little over a month and i'm beyond satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Salvatore

customer_reviews.title: Great Product !!
customer_reviews.text: Really like this product. Was looking for something which I can use to organize my laundry and this fits the bill perfectly. Good quality product, has four decent size bags, easy to assembly and move around. Bags are of good quality. Little bit smaller than expected but after using it for a while, I don't see that as an issue at all. Very happy with the purchase. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Super quality sorter.
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe I could get so excited about a laundry sorter. I struggled with baskets for so long, I should have bought this sooner. It may have been the easiest purchase to assemble, clear instructions and came together in no time. OMG! It rolls like an Olympic champion on ice! It looks tidy, its easy to empty and does the job its meant to. No strong odor as other reviews mentioned. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: linmoogcat

customer_reviews.title: Read my review !
customer_reviews.text: This worked out great for me. I was able to put it together by myself easily in ten minutes or so. (I dread putting stuff together that I buy online BUT it was easy breezy!) It’s sturdy & I like that it’s a Four bag separator. It’s exactly what I needed and I plan to recommend this to anyone looking for one of these. The wheels have a “lock” feature which I didn’t think about when buying one of these so that was a great bonus to find out. Overall great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Marla Litwin

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Looks Great and love the fact that its on wheels! I gave up on the assembly since the pieces were not individually labelled to match the instructions. My husband however assembled it in about 30 mins. Bags were a little more narrow than I expected but they work just fine for my family. Great Value for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Lams Tales

customer_reviews.title: Great hamper!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think I'd be particularly excited by a hamper but boy am I! I wanted something that would have a bunch of sections so I could sort my laundry as I take clothes off...not at laundry time. This thing was easy to assemble (took 10 minutes). It's very sturdy and the bags are plenty big enough. I can take each bag off the hamper and take that right to the washer. It's everything I needed and could ever want in a hamper.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael C.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, looks nice
customer_reviews.text: If you've assembled stuff before this will be super easy. If not, the instructions are clear enough to know what to do. Just make SURE you look at the pictures carefully. After opening the box I noticed there was an unpleasant plastic-y smell. Left it to air out for 2 days in the living room before moving to the bedroom. Several weeks later the smell has dissipated. FYI the direction you hook the bags in unit matter. My OCD was activated because the empty bags didn't line up evenly, but a simple 180 rotation of the bag had everything lined up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: MochaLady

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with a bent main support bar. Worthless and returning.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a bent main support bar.For listing to be heavy duty it's a shame. Looks like someone returned it and the seller did not look to see if it was damaged and resold the item. If the bars bend so easily, and it is suppose to be heavy duty, you are better off buying something that will hold up.Exactly where the bars connect, one of the bars is split in almost half.For the price and listing you are most likely better searching for a better item with some durability.
customer_reviews.author: Mmmm

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Makes my life so much easier My family can easily put their soiled farmers in the correct bag and I can wheel the cart right up to my washer and load quickly! It’s light, sturdy and compact enough to fit into my small laundry space within my kitchen Love love love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smooth sleek stylish & worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble. Nice strong and sturdy laundry bags! they smelled a little funny after we first opened them but the smell went away quickly. I love the industrial wheels they cart glides around like it's on glass! It's fantastic! I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sweetiegold

customer_reviews.title: It transformed our laundry system
customer_reviews.text: I've used other sectional laundry hampers before, and had low expectations for this one, but this thing does all the things it promised, and does them well. The structural screws can stand to be tightened after a while, but it has transformed our laundry system. Instead of dumping our laundry hamper on the hallway floor to sort out a load, everything's sorted and we have a clear picture of what needs to be done by looking for a full basket.
customer_reviews.author: Davidius

customer_reviews.title: Best Hamper Ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my lord, do I love this thing. First of all, it was easy to put together as long as you have a brain. Second, you can freaking dump out your kids greasy clothes without touching them!!! Just pick up the handles and dump. Lastly, they're deep, thick material, and looks great in my laundry room.
customer_reviews.author: LittleBob

customer_reviews.title: Good laundry sorter
customer_reviews.text: Great laundry sorter. Easy to put together, though a screwdriver is needed. I like that I can pull individual bags out to carry my laundry to the washer. The bags are smaller than I anticipated so they don't hold as much laundry as I'd like.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle wiz

customer_reviews.title: Great laundry sorter
customer_reviews.text: I am liking this for my laundry. Makes sorting so much easier. Most I've seen only have 3 bags, so I was happy to find this one has 4. The bags are hooked on, so very easy to remove. Another one I had in the past had velcro. The hooks are much easier. Assembly wasn't difficult. Overall I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Krystle Lawson

customer_reviews.title: A Laundry sorter is a Life Saver
customer_reviews.text: If you've ever pawed your way through a hamper of dirty clothes trying to find all the soiled socks, you know how nasty that chore can be. We use a sorter and so each bag is already for the washing machine. BTW, those socks? I pin them together with a safety pin before I put them in the hamper. That way I never have to sort socks when they come out of the laundry.
customer_reviews.author: Dixie Reader

customer_reviews.title: Fresh look for dirty laundry!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this laundry sorter cart. I have been using various baskets for the last few years, and just became tired of lugging them to and from the laundry room; and none of them matched. The cart was simple to put together, instructions were clear, and it was quick. I put mine together while watching the latest episode of The Bachelor, wine in hand too. Anyways, the cart rolls perfect, the bags are easy to remove and place back into the cart, and they hold a pretty good amount of clothes; I make at least 2 loads out of a full bag. And it's pretty, and makes me feel organized. Can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste N.

customer_reviews.title: Smells super strong
customer_reviews.text: The smell of the material was super strong, we took it outside and let the sun beat on it for two days and it still smells, we took it apart and wash the bags (TWICE) and the smell finally went away. You still can smell a little bit but way better than when we just got it.
customer_reviews.author: Pinkysup670

customer_reviews.title: This is a must!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Easy to use and great for sorting laundry and getting it off the floor out out of the washer til you’re ready to wash clothes. The reason why I’m giving 3 stars is because I ordered and paid for one with 4 bags but received the one with 3 bags, which I kept and just didn’t want to go through the hassle of returning.
customer_reviews.author: Svitlana

customer_reviews.title: space saver
customer_reviews.text: love this thing. it replaced 3 separate laundry baskets between 2 rooms, the bags are the perfect size of a load of laundry, plus the bags have handles so no laundry basket needed, you just remove the bag and carry it to the washer. love it. I did Whites, heavy loads(married to a construction guy), delicates (mine), and towels. assembled it myself in about 30min anyone can do it
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Can't even put it together
customer_reviews.text: Unpacked straight out of the box as soon as we got to our house after moving and discovered the wrong number of rods in the package. It had never been opened. Luckily I tried to put it together while the was still a day left IB my return timeframe. Will find a better product with all the pieces included to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Peter6156

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Build And Holds A Lot Of Clothes!
customer_reviews.text: This was extremely easy to build! I'm a single mom and always have to build what I order myself. I think my 12 year old daughter could have built this. Very simple, sturdy, and holds quite a bit of clothes! My son thinks it's cool because I let him have his own "slot" to encourage him to put his laundry there instead of the floor. Guess what? It worked! (;
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Morton

customer_reviews.title: Great! But minor smell...
customer_reviews.text: I love this hamper! Keeps my laundry organized and easy to assemble. Only took me 10 min. Only thing I’d point out is that there seems to be a grease on some of the wheels but I guess it’s for the movement. And the slight smell of the bags but nothing frebreeze can’t fix! My grandma loves this and I’ll most likely purchase one for her too!
customer_reviews.author: Redd

customer_reviews.title: 5-Star Wannabe
customer_reviews.text: I would love to give this five stars because it was easy to put together, seems sturdy, and moves easily even on my carpet. However, unfortunately my package only had 5 hooks instead of 6 when it arrived. This means I can only use 3 bags. One of the reasons I chose this item was because it had 4 bags. Now I’m short a bag and the cart looks like it’s missing something. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie E Brennan

customer_reviews.title: It'll probably get the job done
customer_reviews.text: It should do fine if it's what you need. It may be sturdy enough, but it's very cheap and janky. Good luck disassembling it. The stitching is extremely fragile, and broke just from inserting one of the handles. Don't anticipate it lasting more than a year of you fill it to the brim. Which you will because despite many positive reviews on the size, it's just not that big. Bags should be closer to the ground and height should be a good 6-10 inches taller and width would benefit from about 6 inches too.
customer_reviews.author: gg

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love it!! Should of bought this years ago when my kids were younger. Nice organization. Easy when your trying to fin one of your favorite peice of clothing. Also it makes you do the laundry because you can see what is piling up for what family member. Instead of guessing and going through one laundry basket full of everyone's clothes not fun.
customer_reviews.author: April J.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Heavy Duty Bags.
customer_reviews.text: I needed to get rid of dirty piles of clothes and this was the perfect solution. The the whole thing is pretty sturdy and the bags are nice and thick. The bags are a little smaller than I would like, but there are 4 so that is good. I like it so much I just bought the 3-bag in white w/bronze. Those bags are a little bigger and will work nicely for blankets n' things. Don't regret the purchase at all!
customer_reviews.author: N.S. Sherlock

customer_reviews.title: Nice 4 bag laundry cart
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together. Seems well made. I love the 4 bags and the handles on top. The bags or a heavy cloth material and don't sag to the floor. The wheels are great to have. My only complaint is on tile the wheels still move some, even in a locked position. I would still recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: kc

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Is exactly what I was looking for. We’re a family of 5 so I always have something to wash and I was tired to separate by colors. Now is easy and everybody do it. Is a simple process for everyone, now my kids think that is fun to be separating the clothes and I’m fine with that, ha. I use stencil and sharpie to tag the bags so easy and l loved the results Took me 20 minutes to assemble with my 9 y/o son. Looks nice and the bags have a good quality and also they have a great capacity. It’s make laundry so easy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lourdes

customer_reviews.title: Renovating a small laundry room
customer_reviews.text: We have this stored under a cabinet with a 3' countertop. With the brakes on the wheels, it's pretty snug. The bags hold enough clothes to efficiently run loads in our extra-large capacity front load washing machine (think big enough to wash queen-sized comforters). Very happy with this product after a couple of weeks of use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great laundry sorter
customer_reviews.text: Love this sorter. I bought it to replace my worn out sorter and was skeptical since I loved my other one and it was a different brand. This one is sturdy, the individual bags are easy to remove and put back in and the cart can be rolled to the laundry room in the house without having to make multiple trips to it on laundry day! Easy to assemble and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Cherie Etchegaray

customer_reviews.title: Laundry sorting made easy
customer_reviews.text: This laundry sorter is just to keep clothes sorted and in one place until wash day. The bags are removable for ease of use and cleaning. The unit slight larger than 2 extra large stacked laundry baskets. The instructions and parts are easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: K. Gates

product_meta.title: Simplehouseware 4-Bag Heavy Duty Rolling Laundry Sorter Cart, Chrome
feature_bullets: STURDY FRAME: Durable chrome finish steel with an EXTRA horizontal behind bar (which counts six horizontal bars in total) making a solid frame
DURABLE BAGS: Each heavy duty bag holds 11 Gallons of clothes, easy to clean
HEAVY DUTY CASTERS: Two of casters come with brake, takes heavy loads and rolls smoothly
Bag Dimension: 23'' H x 15.5'' W x 7.5'' D
Frame Dimension: 32.25'' L x 17.5'' W x 33'' H (height includes casters)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars4,433 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
